name: Salvage Drone
desc: A salvage drone. It is about as effective as a normal crew at salvaging, but is worthless at everything else.

name: Combat Drone
desc: A battle robot meant for ground engagements. Combat drones have very effective weapons, but have a tendency to walk straight into killboxes and other fortifications. Without the flexibility of normal combatants, they must be deployed en masse to overwhelm the enemy.

name: Survey Drone
desc: A specialized survey drone. It's extremely effective at taking samples from the ground and exploring, much more so than normal crew.
